rows.label: qev027005_MSG0005
rows.name:
I just tossed back an extra-large liver-lover pizza...
Nothing like it to build back the blood I lost, is there?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0006
rows.name:
And how are you doing? Any progress on taking care
of whoever did this to me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0007
rows.name: I can't even work on the ship in peace, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0008
rows.name:
I hope you track down the shooter soon and knock
him into tomorrow, okay? Ka-pow, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0009
rows.name: Welcome back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0010
rows.name:
I heard all about everything that happened.
You should maybe go give your report to Bihabba?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0011
rows.name:
The attack came from the northwest, so the shooter has
to be hiding somewhere in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0012
rows.name:
That jerk's shot at me twice too many times as it is,
so make sure he never tries for time three, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0013
rows.name: I'm fuming! Maybe even steaming like a hot pizza?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0014
rows.name: I won't let things end like this, okay? I just won't![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0015
rows.name: Oh, welcome back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0016
rows.name: Glad to see you back here safe, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0017
rows.name: How's that pizza money coming?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_JNK0030
rows.name: Deliver

rows.label: qev027005_SEL0031
rows.name: Hand over 500,000 credits to Heradot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_JNK0040
rows.name: Keep

rows.label: qev027005_SEL0041
rows.name: Hold on to your money for now.

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0018
rows.name: Wow, nice work! Very very nice, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0019
rows.name:
This will buy me a lifetime's worth of pizza, won't it?
...Although that much would probably kill me with
change to spare.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0020
rows.name: But what a way to go, yes? Yes! Perfect![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0021
rows.name:
I suppose risking my life did help make this a safer
place, didn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0022
rows.name:
And now I'm living in in in a pizza paradise!
All's well that ends well, I guess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0023
rows.name: I won't forget the role you played in all this, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0024
rows.name: I'll say it againâ€”nice work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0025
rows.name:
Now if you'll excuse me, I need to go get three meals'
worth of pizza. Plus one for snack time. And guests, in
case someone turns up. And one for emergencies, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0026
rows.name:
I'll just pick up a dozen, maybe? Oooo!
Or I'll be really opulent and just get them delivered![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0027
rows.name:
Aaaah! I'm so glad I survived long enough to die and
go to pizza heaven! ...Don't point out the logic, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0028
rows.name: Pizza pizza pizzaaaa! Ha ha HAA ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0029
rows.name: Grrrr! I'm hungry, yes? VERY VERY HUNGRY![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0030
rows.name: Hurry up with that pizza money, all right?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0031
rows.name: Wha...? You you you don't have enough, do you?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027005_MSG0032
rows.name:
Clearly, the only way I'll ever recover is if you bring me
500,000 credits for a lifetime supply of pizza, isn't it?
So hurry up and earn that money, all right?[ST:wait ]
